org.simalliance.openmobileapi

Class SERecognizerByHistoricalBytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SERecognizer
      • org.simalliance.openmobileapi.SERecognizerByHistoricalBytes

  • public class SERecognizerByHistoricalBytes
extends SERecognizer
    Instances of this class can be used to find a Secure Element with a specific value in their historical bytes.

        public SERecognizerByHistoricalBytes(byte[] values)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes a new instance of the SERecognizerByHistoricalBytes class.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if values has a wrong length or it's null.

    • Method Detail

      • isMatching

        public boolean isMatching(Session session)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets the historical bytes and compares them with the expected ones.
        Specified by:
        isMatching in class SERecognizer
        Parameters:
        session - The session from which the historical bytes will be get.
        Returns:
        true if the historical bytes match, or false if either historical bytes don't match or session ATR has an invalid length.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the used session is null.
